ebawin meki illima sanukampithawa salaka bala palamak, piwisum margayak idikara dena lesa wayambaa palath sabhawe krushikarma amathya thumagen, maha marga amathya thumagen saha anekuth wagakiwayuththangen illamu.aar. em. ke. ee. parakramabowaththaweyangoda, minuwangoda, gampaha, diwulapitiya marga ekkarana sandhisthanayak wana ‘nayiwala’ mansandhiya udasana kalayedi wishala lesa janathawa eekarashi wana sthanayaki.nayiwala handiyata aasannawa pihiti widuhalak saha angalum karmantha shalawak nisath, rakiya sandaha ek ek disawanta gaman ganna piris nisath wisheshayen ma udasanata wishala lesa janathawa eekarashi wethi.mese paminena janathawata para maruwima udesa kaha iri salakunu kota nomathi wima nisa wishala apahasutha walata lakwe.

manushya jiwithayaka watinakama dadi lesa salaka bala dengu uwadura mandimata wahama awashya kriyamarga ganna lesa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha adala baladharinta eeye (12) niyoga kaleya.me sadaha yana wiyadama pilibandawa nowa sthirasara wisadumak laba dima kerehi awadhanaya yomu karana lesath dengu uwadurata kadinam wisandumak diya haki kramawedayak wahama sakasana lesath janadhipathiwaraya upades dunneya.janadhipathiwaraya mese prakasha kale parisara ha punarjananiya balashakthi amathyanshaye pragathi samalochana raswimata ema amathyansha shrawanagarayedi eeye (12)ekwemini..mahinda chinthana idiri dakmata samagamiwa amathyanshaya wisin 2013- 2016 kalaya thula kriyathmaka karana madhya kalina salasuma sambandhayen mehidi sakachcha kerunu athara janathawa wisin idiripath karana lada gatalu saha janadhipathi karyalaya wisin anawaranaya kala gatalu sambandhayen janadhipathithuma mehidi niladharingen karunu wimasuweya .apadrawya kalamanakaranaya, parisara sanrakshanaya, wana wagawa, ruk ropanaya, manik karmanthaya, wali godadamima yanadi karunu sambandhayen mehidi wadi awadhanayak yomu kerina .kasala kalamanakaranaya pilibada dadi awadhanayak yomu kala janadhipathithuma me gataluwata wisandum sewima sakachchawata sima nowi prayogikawa kriyathmaka wiya yuthu bawa awadharanaya kaleya .dirgha kalayak thisse me pilibada sakachcha karamin siti bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya karadiyana saha wallampitiya wani kunu kandu nathi kirime wadapiliwelak kadinamin sakasana lesa parisara amathyansha niladharinta niyoga kaleya .monama rajaye aayathanayak wuwath mahajanathawata karadarayak nowana andamin katayuthu kirime wadagathkama penwa dun janadhipathithuma ee sambandhayen niladharinge aakalpawala wenasak wiya yuthu bawath departhamenthu pradhanin ee pilibanda awadhanaya yomu kala yuthu bawath kiweya.manik karmanthaye yedena asarana minisun pilibadawa sanukampithawa katayuthu karana lesath kuda parimanayen udalu wani upakarana yoda gena ema karmanthaye yedena janathawata balapath nikuth kirimata katayuthu karana lesath janadhipathithuma upades dunneya.deshiya wana wagawa siyayata 35 dakwa ihala nanwimata parisara amathyanshaya idiripath kara athi salasum kerehi awadhanaya yomu kala janadhipathithuma ehi pragathiya wimasa sitiyeya.nithi rithi wadi wena tharamatama dushanath wadi wena bawa pawasu janadhipathiwaraya yam yam dewalata balapathra dimedi janathawa apahasuthawata path nowana, rasthiyadu nowana sarala kramaweda anugamanaya kala yuthu bawa pawasiya.parisara ha punarjananiya balashakthi amathi susil premajayantha, aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha, parisara niyojya amathi abdul kadar, janadhipathi lekam lalith wirathunga, mudal amathyansha lekam aacharya pi. bi. jayasundara mahathwaru athulu pirisak da me awasthawata ek wuha..
